query:
SELECT c.id, c.customerPhone, c.customerName, c.lastMessageAt, c.status, m.merchantName 
FROM conversations c 
JOIN merchants m ON c.merchantId = m.id 
ORDER BY c.lastMessageAt DESC 
LIMIT 10;
command:

FROM conversations c 
JOIN merchants m ON c.merchantId = m.id
